summary: A PyTorch-based driver script that sets up, trains, and evaluates the Neural Graph Collaborative Filtering (NGCF) model. It handles data preparation, model instantiation, optimizer configuration, training loops with early stopping, and batch testing of recommendation performance.
business_intent: Provide a runnable example for training and assessing a graph neural network recommendation model, enabling developers and researchers to experiment with NGCF on their own datasets.
